title: Kinsing Crypto Malware Targets Linux Systems via Apache ActiveMQ Flaw
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

Patches for all affected versions of Apache ActiveMQ have been released, and clients are strongly advised to upgrade their systems.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Kinsing Crypto Malware Targets Linux Systems via Apache ActiveMQ Flaw

title: FBI Alert: Silent Ransom Group Utilizes Callback Phishing for Network Hacks
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

The culprit behind these callback phishing attacks, known as Silent Ransom Group (SRG), is also identified as Luna Moth.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: FBI Alert: Silent Ransom Group Utilizes Callback Phishing for Network Hacks
